front.title: IEEE/ISO/IEC International Standard - Information technology - Telecommunications and information exchange between systems - Local and metropolitan area networks - Specific requirements - Part 1Q:Bridges and bridged networks- AMENDMENT 6: Per-stream filtering and policing
front.abstract: Enhancements to the forwarding process that support per-stream filtering and policing are provided in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2014.
